name: Sea Shanty
description:
Arrrr, I can’t find any land anymore! Sail across the seven seas, buy upgrades for your ship but don’t end up like the titanic… 

Pick up the barrels of rum along your way, they will keep you hydrated for a longer time.

Controls
Move with arrow keys to evade obstacles and collect coins. 

Credits
Tobias Géron: code 
Yanti De Visser: art
Keran Li: music (soundcloud)

This game is a submission for the ZenoJam 3rd edition. The theme was "It Never Ends". This game is an infinite scroller on the seemingly endless sea.
